heading: Monday Night
text: Scattered early snow showers across the region, and then overnight in the northern mountains; another trace to 2 inches, mainly over high terrain. Lows in the teens south, and 5 to 10 above in the north, except around zero in the Adirondacks. North to northwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny, except partly cloudy northeast, and in the mountains. Valley highs in the upper teens to lower 20s, with some mid teens far north, and mid to upper 20s southeast. Winds from the northwest at 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early east of the Greens.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mainly clear, then clouds increasing from the west after midnight. Lows from zero to 10 above in the south, and 10 below to 5 above north. Winds becoming light and variable.
